name: Sharpsell
description: Sharpsell.ai is India's leading field-tested Sales Playbook Automation Platform built for high-velocity sales teams. Trusted by enterprises to replicate deal-winning behaviour and create sales champions at scale. Currently being used by over 550,000+ sales reps across leading BFSI and Pharma companies like Bajaj Allianz, Axis Bank, TATA Capital, IDFC First Bank, HDFC Life, Kotak Life Insurance, Aditya Birla Capital, Torrent Pharma, JB Pharma and more. The Sharpsell.ai platform was developed from the ground up after shadowing hundreds of salespeople in the field for more than 6 months. One of our co-founders worked as a field sales agent in financial services to understand the challenges first-hand. What culminated was a pioneering approach to sales tooling, that combined the principles of learning & real-time enablement through features like ready-to-use sales pitches, dynamic personalized content and AI-powered sales coaching.
features: Replicate best practices and winning behaviour

enhanced_description: Sharpsell.ai is India's premier Sales Playbook Automation Platform, specifically designed for high-velocity sales teams within large enterprises. It empowers organizations to build, automate, and deploy sales playbooks, thereby replicating deal-winning behaviors and developing sales champions at scale. The platform provides real-time enablement through features such as ready-to-use sales pitches, dynamic personalized content, and AI-powered sales coaching. Its development was informed by extensive field research, including direct experience as a sales agent, ensuring a practical and pioneering approach to sales tooling. Sharpsell.ai is widely adopted, serving over 550,000 sales representatives across leading BFSI (Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance) and Pharmaceutical companies, with a stated objective to improve employee happiness and engagement.
